So‚Ä¶what is the Monday Poll?

Excellent question! It isn‚Äôt, contrary to its name, an actual poll, like with little clicky buttons. It‚Äôs just a list of more or less random questions I‚Äôve been posting on this blog every Monday morning for the past quadrillion years (since 2007).

1. Are you contemplating any limited edition holiday makeup releases?

I usually prefer products in the permanent collections because in my experience holiday makeup performs differently for whatever reason. I do love a holiday fragrance set, though!

2. Are BB creams worth your time?

My answer was no back in the day, but now that I‚Äôm into minimal base, I‚Äôm thinking it could be good if I find one that agrees with my skin. Hmm, maybe that will be my next makeup project ‚Äì finding ‚Äúthe one.‚Äù I stumbled onto this one by Dr. Jart and it looks pretty good.

3. Your favorite video game?

It‚Äôs all about old school Tetris on a Gameboy, baby!

4.Advice you wish you would‚Äôve received as a young person?

I wish someone would‚Äôve found a way to convey to me without sounding judgemental or preachy that worrying about boys is a waste of time and that throwing yourself fully into your studies with an exciting end goal in mind (like studying abroad), is the key.

5. Something you hope to accomplish this week?

Make it through the week with a growth mindset. üôÇ

Your friendly neighborhood beauty addict,

Karen
